Package index

Multiblock object

A common object type for many multiblock methods.

multiblock-package multiblock
multiblock
scores(<multiblock>) loadings(<multiblock>) print(<multiblock>) summary(<multiblock>)
Result Functions for Multiblock Objects
scoreplot(<multiblock>) loadingplot(<multiblock>) loadingweightplot() biplot(<multiblock>) corrplot()
Plot Functions for Multiblock Objects

Basic methods

Single- and two-block methods

basic
Single- and Two-Block Methods
pca()
Principal Component Analysis - PCA
reexports pcr plsr MSEP R2 RMSEP coefplot cvsegments loading.weights loadingplot loadings mvrValstats predplot scoreplot scores validationplot

ifa()
Inter-battery Factor Analysis - IFA
gsvd()
Generalised Singular Value Decomposition - GSVD

popls()
